description: Manage connection strings for an Azure IoT Hub Device Provisioning Service instance.

commands.name: az iot dps connection-string show
commands.summary: Show the connection strings for the specified Device Provisioning Services using the given policy name and key.
commands.syntax:
az iot dps connection-string show [--all]
                                  [--dps-name]
                                  [--key-type {primary, secondary}]
                                  [--pn]
                                  [--resource-group]
examples: az iot dps connection-string show --resource-group MyResourceGroup
az iot dps connection-string show -n MyDPS --all
az iot dps connection-string show -n MyDPS
az iot dps connection-string show -n MyDPS --policy-name service --key-type secondary
